Articles.Content:
So! I'm not actually new to any of this, but I've been off for about six months. Am I allowed to ask for a welcome back?

Because I missed a lot of the changes (didn't really get to play .24, much less .24.2, and don't even talk about .25...), I feel like I'm more scared to jump back into KSP than I was going in the first place . It seems like a lot has changed (noo.... my ultimate career save with New Horizons replica mission from .23.5 isn't very relevant because updates.....)

Has it? I logged on to Steam today to find that the initial Beta stage was just released today, much to my surprise.

So! I'm not actually new to any of this, but I've been off for about six months. Am I allowed to ask for a welcome back?

Oh no it's y- oh wait

JK welcome back! Just in time for .90 update! Hopefully this update will revive the forums a bit, they seem a bit mellow lately....

Welcome (back) to the forums!

There have been a few changes, yes, but if you're still familiar with the basics, I'm sure you'll adjust in no time. Just start from what you know and push the boundaries back little by little.

If you still have any specific questions, the Gameplay Questions and Tutorials forum is still active and chock-full of helpful people, and you may find something useful in the tutorials and resources listed in the Drawing Board, which is conveniently linked through my signature.

Hope this helps!
